text: Thomas Kyd (1558-1594) was an English playwright. Kyd is the author of The Spanish Tragedy. It was the most popular play of the time and many playwrights imitated it. A character in The Spanish Tragedy likely influenced Shakespeare when writing Hamlet. Kyd was one of the first users of blank verse in English literature. "extraordinary dramatic (if not poetic) genius". == References == ==Other websites== * Full text of The Spanish Tragedy by Thomas Kyd Category:1558 births Category:1616 deaths Category:English playwrights
title: Thomas Kyd
